designations.source: Agreement on the Conservation of African-Eurasian Migratory Waterbirds (AEWA)
designations.source_description: Agreement on the Conservation of African-Eurasian Migratory Waterbirds (AEWA) as adopted by the 4th Session of the Meeting of the Parties to AEWA, September 2008. Published by the UNEP/AEWA Secretariat, UN-Premises, Hermann-Ehlers-Str. 10, D-53113 Bonn, Germany
designations.designation_description: Conservation of migratory waterbirds, giving special attention to endangered species as well as to those with an unfavourable conservation status.
designations.criteria_description: Species of birds that are ecologically dependent on wetlands for at least part of their annual cycle, have a range which lies entirely or partly within the Agreement Area
